name: 10th Anniversary PlayStation & PlayStation 2 All Soft Catalogue Special SaveData Collection
synopsis: This Japanese only edition of PlayStation & PlayStation2 software encyclopedia includes covers, screenshots and descriptions (Japanese) of around 5,000 PS and PS2 games from 1994 to 2004. The package includes 2 PlayStation & PlayStation2 compatible "Memorial Save Data" discs which contain a total of 1467 save games from assorted titles.
